BBCTS.showTokenList.title: Display List of Tokens
BBCTS.showTokenList.hint: Determines whether or not to show a list of token names as a tool tip when hovering over tokens.
BBCTS.showTokenList.stacked: Show When Stacked Two or More
BBCTS.minClickDelay.title: Click Threshold (milliseconds)
BBCTS.minClickDelay.hint: Minimum duration (ms) between single clicks to trigger cycling; avoids conflict with double-click.
BBCTS.keyCycleForward.title: Cycle Token Forward Key
BBCTS.keyCycleForward.hint: Moves the token under the mouse to the top of the stack. Pressing Ctrl will align GM settings to players.
BBCTS.keyCycleBackward.title: Push Token Behind Key
BBCTS.keyCycleBackward.hint: Moves the token under the mouse to bottom of the stack. Pressing Alt resets ordering.
